column7: Static electric and magnetic fields, their interactions with electric charge and current, and their transformation properties; the effect of special relativity is incorporated. Macroscopic fields in material media are described. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: MATH 285; credit for PHYS 325. Concurrent enrollment in MATH 415.
column9: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: MATH 285; credit for PHYS 325. Concurrent enrollment in MATH 415.
column11: Register for the lecture and one of the discussion sections.
